meanings.definition: A deep-sea submersible vessel used for exploring the ocean depths.
meanings.sent1: The bathyspheres descended slowly into the dark ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used the bathyspheres to discover new species in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The bathyspheres threw a party at the bottom of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bathysphere, delving into the depths of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The bathyspheres illuminated the mysterious underwater world.

meanings.definition: The study or exploration of the ocean depths using a bathysphere.
meanings.sent1: Oceanographers conducted bathyspheres to learn about deep-sea ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: The bathyspheres mission revealed fascinating information about the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The bathyspheres held a science fair at the bottom of the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a bathysphere, diving into the unknown depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bathyspheres journeyed to the darkest corners of the ocean for research purposes.
